data.answer: For sensitive X-ray detection and imaging

data.question: How does the metal-organic framework achieve high spatial resolution in X-ray imaging?
data.answer: By embedding it into a polymer matrix to obtain a flexible composite film

data.question: What makes the metal-organic framework suitable for X-ray imaging applications?
data.answer: Its rapid luminescent decay time, high X-ray sensitivity, and excellent radiation and hygroscopic hardness

data.question: How does the structure of the metal-organic framework contribute to its stability under X-ray irradiation?
data.answer: The robust framework structure and strong C–H⋅⋅⋅π stacking interactions
